org.apache.flink.runtime.instance

类 SlotPool

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.flink.runtime.rpc.RpcEndpoint
      • org.apache.flink.runtime.instance.SlotPool
  • 所有已实现的接口:
    SlotPoolGateway, RpcGateway

    public class SlotPool
extends RpcEndpoint
implements SlotPoolGateway
    The slot pool serves slot request issued by Scheduler or ExecutionGraph. It will will attempt to acquire new slots from the ResourceManager when it cannot serve a slot request. If no ResourceManager is currently available, or it gets a decline from the ResourceManager, or a request times out, it fails the slot request. The slot pool also holds all the slots that were offered to it and accepted, and can thus provides registered free slots even if the ResourceManager is down. The slots will only be released when they are useless, e.g. when the job is fully running but we still have some free slots.

    All the allocation or the slot offering will be identified by self generated AllocationID, we will use it to eliminate ambiguities. TODO : Make pending requests location preference aware TODO : Make pass location preferences to ResourceManager when sending a slot request

      Organize all available slots from different points of view.

      A pending request for a slot

      A slot, together with the timestamp when it was added

      • start

        public void start()
        从类复制的说明: RpcEndpoint
        Starts the rpc endpoint. This tells the underlying rpc server that the rpc endpoint is ready to process remote procedure calls. IMPORTANT: Whenever you override this method, call the parent implementation to enable rpc processing. It is advised to make the parent call last.
        覆盖:
        start 在类中 RpcEndpoint

      • start

        public void start(JobMasterId jobMasterId,
                  java.lang.String newJobManagerAddress)
           throws java.lang.Exception
        Start the slot pool to accept RPC calls.
        参数:
        jobMasterId - The necessary leader id for running the job.
        newJobManagerAddress - for the slot requests which are sent to the resource manager
        抛出:
        java.lang.Exception

      • connectToResourceManager

        public void connectToResourceManager(ResourceManagerGateway resourceManagerGateway)
        从接口复制的说明: SlotPoolGateway
        Connects the SlotPool to the given ResourceManager. After this method is called, the SlotPool will be able to request resources from the given ResourceManager.
        指定者:
        connectToResourceManager 在接口中 SlotPoolGateway
        参数:
        resourceManagerGateway - The RPC gateway for the resource manager.

      • disconnectResourceManager

        public void disconnectResourceManager()
        从接口复制的说明: SlotPoolGateway
        Disconnects the slot pool from its current Resource Manager. After this call, the pool will not be able to request further slots from the Resource Manager, and all currently pending requests to the resource manager will be canceled.

        The slot pool will still be able to serve slots from its internal pool.

        指定者:
        disconnectResourceManager 在接口中 SlotPoolGateway

      • internalReturnAllocatedSlot

        private void internalReturnAllocatedSlot(Slot slot)
        Return the slot back to this pool without releasing it. It's mainly called by failed / cancelled tasks, and the slot can be reused by other pending requests if the resource profile matches.n
        参数:
        slot - The slot needs to be returned

      • pollMatchingPendingRequest

        private SlotPool.PendingRequest pollMatchingPendingRequest(AllocatedSlot slot)

      • offerSlots

        public java.util.concurrent.CompletableFuture<java.util.Collection<SlotOffer>> offerSlots(java.util.Collection<Tuple2<AllocatedSlot,SlotOffer>> offers)
        指定者:
        offerSlots 在接口中 SlotPoolGateway

      • offerSlot

        public java.util.concurrent.CompletableFuture<java.lang.Boolean> offerSlot(AllocatedSlot slot)
        Slot offering by TaskManager with AllocationID. The AllocationID is originally generated by this pool and transfer through the ResourceManager to TaskManager. We use it to distinguish the different allocation we issued. Slot offering may be rejected if we find something mismatching or there is actually no pending request waiting for this slot (maybe fulfilled by some other returned slot).
        指定者:
        offerSlot 在接口中 SlotPoolGateway
        参数:
        slot - The offered slot
        返回:
        True if we accept the offering

      • failAllocation

        public void failAllocation(AllocationID allocationID,
                           java.lang.Exception cause)
        Fail the specified allocation and release the corresponding slot if we have one. This may triggered by JobManager when some slot allocation failed with timeout. Or this could be triggered by TaskManager, when it finds out something went wrong with the slot, and decided to take it back.
        指定者:
        failAllocation 在接口中 SlotPoolGateway
        参数:
        allocationID - Represents the allocation which should be failed
        cause - The cause of the failure

      • registerTaskManager

        public void registerTaskManager(ResourceID resourceID)
        Register TaskManager to this pool, only those slots come from registered TaskManager will be considered valid. Also it provides a way for us to keep "dead" or "abnormal" TaskManagers out of this pool.
        指定者:
        registerTaskManager 在接口中 SlotPoolGateway
        参数:
        resourceID - The id of the TaskManager

      • releaseTaskManager

        public java.util.concurrent.CompletableFuture<Acknowledge> releaseTaskManager(ResourceID resourceID)
        Unregister TaskManager from this pool, all the related slots will be released and tasks be canceled. Called when we find some TaskManager becomes "dead" or "abnormal", and we decide to not using slots from it anymore.
        指定者:
        releaseTaskManager 在接口中 SlotPoolGateway
        参数:
        resourceID - The id of the TaskManager

        private SimpleSlot createSimpleSlot(AllocatedSlot slot,

SlotPool.AllocatedSlots getAllocatedSlots()
